experience.name: Politics of the United States of America

question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "What is the most inappropriate thing ever said by a US President at a press conference?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

credentials.translatedString: M.A Sociology & International Relations, University of Edinburgh (1998)

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Just when I thought Trump couldn\u2019t sink any lower, last Friday happened.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-36034619834ef5294d3d0e801081927c", "height": 460, "width": 950, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-8c46ef256093d318d5dbb0d1270f22cd", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "CHIP SOMODEVILLA / GETTY IMAGES", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "When PBS correspondent Yamiche Alcindor asked Trump about his plan to address racial inequality, the president pressed his fingers to his lips and said \u201cshhh.\u201d", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": " ", "modifiers": {"citation": {"target": {"type": "url", "url": "https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.inquisitr.com/6094146/donald-trump-hush-black-reporter/amp/"}, "title": "Donald Trump Hushes Black Reporter Who Asked About His Response To Systemic Racism", "index": 1, "unique_id": "GZGqu"}}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Pretty much every press conference Trump holds is an opportunity for him to show how classless, base, self-aggrandizing and out of touch with reality he is. He tells reporters to shut up, be quiet, they are \u201cbad reporters\u201d and they should be ashamed of themselves.", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": " ", "modifiers": {"citation": {"target": {"type": "url", "url": "https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.businessinsider.com/trump-lashes-out-at-reporters-during-coronavirus-press-briefings-2020-4%3famp"}, "title": "11 times Trump has lashed out at reporters and called them 'nasty' during his coronavirus press briefings", "index": 2, "unique_id": "ChLiE"}}}, {"text": " He calls them \u201cfake news\u201d.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "But to shh someone? Especially a black reporter asking about systemic racism in the middle of riots and protests? How fucking patronizing can he be?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "And he followed that up by declaring George Floyd is looking down from heaven and is \u201chappy\u201d to see job counts increase. I don\u2019t think he could have said anything worse if he tried.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Every press conference shows just how wrong it is to have this failed businessman as our President. He wouldn\u2019t know how to lead a Sunday school class, let alone an entire nation. He\u2019s not funny. His diction is horrible. He can\u2019t read off a teleprompter. He has no charisma. Someone needs to tell him he can\u2019t be on camera anymore.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Shh. With finger to his lips. What an asshole.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "But, today\u2019s a new day. I\u2019m sure he can beat that show of depravity with something worse if we just give him a chance.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
